item.title: How We Plan a Podcast Season
item.description: The long holiday weekend provided me the opportunity to start work on the next season of The Findings Report, the podcast that I produce with Molly Schreiber. If you havenâ€™t listed in, the show is a deep dive on consumer psychology. Each episode examines why people buy, like and share through the lens of a specific behavioral trend. Ok, enough with the plug. Back to my long weekend work.
